Helen Walker

Ridiculous ideas that I have while I'm at work... #472

Aug 6, 2014

There are so many print options - can I add one more?

Wouldn't it be great your printers could have a series of pre-recorded comments that they could play as they printed things for you:

"oooops" for when you have to reprint a page because you found the typo in the title.

"Hurray" for when you print the final version of something you've worked on for ages.

or perhaps a short fanfare or an exclamation of "that's the most interesting document I've printed all year!" Or maybe something a lot less polite when you have to print off something pointless!
